title: Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers in an Ontology Subsection or Single Profile

fields.label: General Title of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used. This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of fake subpage (or section) for providers in areas of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Intro Text of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_intro_general
fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used. This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of fake subpage (or section) for providers in areas of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Featured Image of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers
fields.name: provider_fpage_featured_image_general
fields.instructions:
Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

fields.label: Title of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers in Locations Subsection
fields.name: provider_fpage_title_location
fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.

fields.label: Intro Text of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers in Location Subsection
fields.name: provider_fpage_intro_location
fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used.

fields.label: Featured Image of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Providers in Location Subsection
fields.name: provider_fpage_featured_image_location
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the general placement image will be used.

Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.
